mapper.insert: insert into user_record_info( user_open_id, create_time ) values ( #{userOpenId}, now() )
insert into user_info( open_id, avatar_url, nick_name, province, city, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{openId}, #{avatarUrl}, #{nickName}, #{province}, #{city}, now(), now() )
